primary.context: Customer wanted to pay a balance of $1,484.81 via credit card
primary.detail: The AI successfully verified the account and balance but encountered a technical error when attempting to send the payment link, resulting in a transfer.

steps: Customer requested to pay maintenance fees.
Agent performed identity verification (name spelling and state).
Agent retrieved account balance and contract details.
Agent confirmed contact information for link delivery.
Agent encountered a system error while sending the link and initiated a transfer to concierge.

failure.detail: The agent explicitly stated there was an issue sending the information after the user confirmed their phone number.

clarifications.note: Agent asked for spelling of name

actions.detail: Verified name spelling and state of Illinois
System error occurred during link generation/delivery
Transferred to concierge due to technical failure

insights.summary: The customer attempted to pay maintenance fees. The AI successfully identified the account and balance but failed to send the payment link due to a technical error, leading to a transfer to the concierge department.
insights.verbatim: It seems like there was an issue while sending your information. I will now transfer you to our concierge department.
insights.coaching: The agent followed the correct protocol for a technical failure by transferring to a human, but the underlying API/delivery issue for the payment link needs investigation.
